name: InsultBotTM
description:
Ever wanted to run a software that insults you for no reason? Well look no further. 

InsultBot was designed to put the insecurities of the creator onto any one who decides to use it.  And with updates to come in the future there is never anything to feel happy about.

please note: this is still in development so it wont look professional at all. this is also something I made whilst bored in lockdown.
